mapper.update: UPDATE Visited SET updatedAt = NOW() WHERE userIdx =#{userIdx} and storeIdx=#{storeIdx}
mapper.select: select s.storeIdx,s.storeName, s.storeImage, (CASE s.storeBrand WHEN 0 then '미 설정' WHEN 1 then '골프존' WHEN 2 then '골프존파크' WHEN 3 then '레드골프' WHEN 4 then '시티존' WHEN 5 then '오케이온' WHEN 6 then '프렌즈스크린T' WHEN 7 then '프렌즈스크린G' WHEN 8 then 'SG골프' END) AS storeType, s.reserveStatus, s.couponStatus, (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(reviewScore) / COUNT(reviewIdx), 1), 0) FROM Reviews r WHERE r.storeIdx = s.storeIdx) AS reviewStar FROM Visited v join Stores s on v.storeIdx = s.storeIdx WHERE v.userIdx=#{userIdx} Order By v.updatedAt DESC LIMIT #{pageInfo.firstIndex}, #{recordsPerPage}
